slides.script: I forgot my best friend's birthday...for the 3rd year in a row. The stress was eating me alive. I felt like I was losing my mind.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic close-up of a stressed woman holding her head, looking overwhelmed and exhausted, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: It wasn't just the forgetfulness. I was snapping at my kids, tossing and turning all night, and feeling anxious 24/7. I was a mess.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic shot of a woman lying awake in bed at night, looking frustrated and unable to sleep, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: What doctors don't tell you is that chronic stress can literally shrink your brain. While I was struggling, an ancient solution already existed...
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of an ancient Indian medical text with Ayurvedic herbs and formulas, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: My yoga instructor pulled me aside after class. She told me about an herb called Ashwagandha, used for centuries to calm the mind and body. I was skeptical, but desperate.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a yoga instructor talking to a stressed woman after class, with a bottle of Ashwagandha capsules in hand, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I did some digging and found out Ashwagandha has been clinically proven to reduce stress, improve sleep, and even boost brain function. It's like a reset button for your mind.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of scientific research papers and studies on Ashwagandha, with graphs showing improvements in stress levels and cognitive performance, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Day 3: I noticed I was falling asleep faster. Day 7: I wasn't snapping at my family anymore. Week 2: I felt like a new person - calm, focused, and in control.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic timeline graphic showing a woman's transformation from stressed to calm and happy over 2 weeks, with specific milestones at Day 3, Day 7, and Week 2, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: My skeptical husband started taking them too. Now he tells everyone how much more patient and present he feels. Even my mom noticed the difference in me.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a happy couple hugging, with the husband holding a bottle of Ashwagandha gummies and the wife looking calm and content, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I now have the energy to keep up with my kids, the focus to crush it at work, and the peace of mind I've been craving for years. And it's all thanks to one little herb.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a woman looking rejuvenated and energetic, playing with her kids and smiling brightly, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: The Ashwagandha gummies I take are from Goli. They use the highest quality organic Ashwagandha root, clinically proven to lower stress and boost brain power. And they taste amazing too.
